sen.e: As Kokamonin Seishi was the daughter of Tadamichi and the sister of FUJIWARA no Kanezane, Kokamonin no Betto composed poems on occasions related to Kanezane, such as the "Udaijin Kanezane ke uta-awase" (poetry contest sponsored by the Minister of the Right Kanezane) in 1175 (the first year of the Angen era) and the "Udaijin-ke Hyakushu" (Hundred-Poem Sequence sponsored by the Minister of the Right's family) in 1178 (the second year of Jisho era).
